episodes.title: Captain Cook
episodes.description: Captain Blackadder spots an opportunity to get away from the trenches when General Melchett announces a painting competition for the cover of "King and Country" magazine.

episodes.title: Corporal Punishment
episodes.description: Blackadder hatches a cunning plan to avoid starvation and ignore his orders by eating a carrier pigeon.

episodes.title: Major Star
episodes.description: Blackadder sees an opportunity to escape the trenches by organizing a variety show as entertainment for the troops.

episodes.title: Private Plane
episodes.description: Blackadder and his friends join the Air Corps, wrongly believing it will be less dangerous than being in the trenches.

episodes.title: General Hospital
episodes.description: The General asks Blackadder to find a spy in the hospital; one of the patients has a thick German accent and an interest in all things military.

episodes.title: Goodbyeee
episodes.description: Blackadder pretends that he's insane to avoid certain death carrying out the General's order for the "big push".
